BREAST-COMPOSITION: fibro fatty and glandular breast parenchyma (ACR B)
FINDINGS: A well-defined, round soft opacity seen in the upper outer quadrant of the breast suggests a benign lesion (BIRADS 3). No suspicious calcifications or masses are observed. The nipple and skin appear normal with no retraction noted. A few small axillary lymph nodes are present but do not show any concerning features.
